short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Options to select the equipped gear and save it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This addon allows you in the BIS lists on wowtbc.gg to select the items that are equipped or owned. These items are then saved and highlighted in green.
A link to wowhead search is also provided.
